properties.description: Loadingmask is displayed since load the page or not               Values can be: false or true               Default: true
properties.name: display

properties.description: Time until loadingmask hides               Value must be a number of milliseconds               Default: 2000
properties.name: display

properties.description: What loadingmask occupies               Values can be: complete or descendant               Default: complete
properties.name: format
